game.name: The Eyes of Ouros
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An infinitely generating third person shooter Rougelite. Experience the end of the world through various survivors with unique abilities. Explore and loot the underground as you go deeper to escape the hell on the surface. Try to go as deep underground as possible.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An infinitely generating third person shooter Rougelite. Experience the end of the world through various survivors with unique abilities. Explore and loot the underground as you go deeper to escape the hell on the surface. Try to go as deep underground as possible.
